resources.string:
Find the words as quickly as possible and accumulate lives. Each word gives you 100 points and each 1500 points grants you one more life.
\nWarning : you only have 1 munites per word. Let\'s go !!

accumulate more lives by finding words quickly.
\nWarning : you only have 50 seconds per word
Gain even more points in this stage , because rudes batlles are coming. \nwarning: you only have 40 seconds per word

Congratulations! \n You are about to become a legend, but you still have some battles left. Find at least 7 out of 10 words in 40 seconds and go for the ultimate battle.
\nWarning: you only have 25 touches per word

Find the words as quickly as possible and accumulate lives. Each word gives you 100 points and each 1500 points grants you one more life.
Please note: you only have 1 munites per word. Let\'s go !!
